DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective non-interventional study investigate Seroquel XR Seroquel IR use clinical practice inpatient schizophrenia . This do retrospective review medical record evaluate patient treat Seroquel XR Seroquel IR primary antipsychotic treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Non-interventional Study Evaluate Use Seroquel Extended Release ( XR ) Immediate Release ( IR ) Clinical Practice Inpatients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis schizophrenia . At least one dose Seroquel XR Seroquel IR study period ( 1st July 2009 30th September 2010 ) . Hospitalization due psychotic symptom time study period ( 1st July 2009 30th September 2010 ) admission discharge date available . Participation clinical trial study period . Treatment forensic care accord LRV ( `` Lagen om Rättspsykiatrisk Vård '' ) .
